price: 22. Dus hij riep zijn Heer: “Dit zijn zeker de mensen die misdadig zijn.”
arabic: فَدَعَا رَبَّهُۥٓ أَنَّ هَٰٓؤُلَآءِ قَوۡمٞ مُّجۡرِمُونَ

version.title: Dutch translation
version.description: Translation of the meanings of the Noble Qur’an into the Dutch language, for the Dutch Islamic Center - in progress.

meta.transliteration: fadaʿā rabbahu anna hāulāi qawmun muj'rimūna
